title: Calamari Salad with Passion-Fruit Dressing
directions: Plunge squid into a large saucepan of boiling water, then remove pan from heat and let stand, stirring once or twice, 1â€š minutes. Drain squid in a colander and cool. Halve squid bodies lengthwise, then cut crosswise into very thin slices. Cut tentacles into bite-size pieces.
Halve each passion fruit crosswise, then scoop out pulp and force through a fine sieve into a large bowl, discarding seeds. Whisk in remaining ingredients, then add squid and toss well.
ingredients: 1 pound cleaned squid, bodies and tentacles left whole
1 tablespoon finely grated peeled fresh ginger
